SCTX - Script Source:
ScriptName fbmwFGAdvancementQuestScript


; For the purposes of determining Skills in this Script, the Secondary Skills are ignored.  They are a joke and not worth the added complexity

; 0 = Associate		    0 FighterReputation,	Strength 30, Endurance 30
; 1 = Apprentice	    5 FighterReputation,	Strength 30, Endurance 30, One Skill at 10
; 2 = Journeyman	  10 FighterReputation,	Strength 30, Endurance 30, One Skill at 20
; 3 = Swordsman	  20 FighterReputation,	Strength 30, Endurance 30, One Skill at 30 + Two Skills at   5
; 4 = Protector		  30 FighterReputation,	Strength 30, Endurance 30, One Skill at 40 + Two Skills at 10
; 5 = Defender		  45 FighterReputation,	Strength 31, Endurance 31, One Skill at 50 + Two Skills at 15
; 6 = Warder		  60 FighterReputation,	Strength 32, Endurance 32, One Skill at 60 + Two Skills at 20
; 7 = Guardian		  90 FighterReputation,	Strength 33, Endurance 33, One Skill at 70 + Two Skills at 25
; 8 = Champion		110 FighterReputation,	Strength 34, Endurance 34, One Skill at 80 + Two Skills at 30
; 9 = Master			125 FighterReputation,	Strength 35, Endurance 35, One Skill at 90 + Two Skills at 35

; Fighter = Armorer, Blade, Block, Blunt, HeavyArmor, LightArmor

SHORT FighterAdvancement
; 0 = Nothing Qualifies
; 1 = Skills Qualify; Reputation Does Not
; 2 = Reputation Qualifies, but Skills do Not
; 3 = Qualified For Advancement
; 4 = Script Needs To Set Next Rank
; 5 = No More Advancement

SHORT FighterReputation

SHORT QualifyReputation
SHORT QualifySkills

short ExpelledOnce

float fQuestDelayTime

BEGIN GameMode

	if (fQuestDelayTime != 0.5)
		set fQuestDelayTime to 0.5
	endif
	
	if PlayerInMorrowind == 0
		return	;there really is no need to run this in Cyrodiil
	endif

	If Player.GetInFaction fbmwFightersGuild == 0
		return
	endif

;This part of the script handles expulsion

	If Player.GetInFaction fbmwFightersGuild
		If GetPCFactionSteal fbmwFightersGuild
			if eval (Call mwGetFactionWitnessesFunc fbmwFightersGuild)
				SetPCExpelled fbmwFightersGuild 1
				MessageBox "You have been expelled from Fighters Guild."
				AddTopic 1makeSamends
			else
				SetPCFactionSteal fbmwFightersGuild 0
			endif
		EndIf

		If GetPCFactionAttack fbmwFightersGuild
			if eval (Call mwGetFactionWitnessesFunc fbmwFightersGuild)
				SetPCExpelled fbmwFightersGuild 1
				MessageBox "You have been expelled from Fighters Guild."
				AddTopic 1makeSamends
			else
				SetPCFactionAttack fbmwFightersGuild 0
			endif
		EndIf

	EndIf

;The rest of the script below handles skill checks and advancement

	SET QualifyReputation TO 0
	SET QualifySkills TO 0

	IF FighterAdvancement == 4 ; Need To Set Next Rank
		IF GetStage fbmwFGAdvancement == 10
			SetStage fbmwFGAdvancement 11
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwFGAdvancement == 20
			SetStage fbmwFGAdvancement 21
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwFGAdvancement == 30
			SetStage fbmwFGAdvancement 31
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwFGAdvancement == 40
			SetStage fbmwFGAdvancement 41
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwFGAdvancement == 50
			SetStage fbmwFGAdvancement 51
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwFGAdvancement == 60
			SetStage fbmwFGAdvancement 61
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwFGAdvancement == 70
			SetStage fbmwFGAdvancement 71
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwFGAdvancement == 80
			SetStage fbmwFGAdvancement 81
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwFGAdvancement == 90
			SetStage fbmwFGAdvancement 91
			SET FighterAdvancement TO 5
			RETURN
		ENDIF

		SET FighterAdvancement TO 0
; don't return here, continue processing to see if you can advance more than one rank	
;		RETURN
	ENDIF ; FighterAdvancement == 4

	IF FighterAdvancement == 3 || FighterAdvancement == 5
		RETURN
	ENDIF



	IF GetStage fbmwFGAdvancement < 10 && Player.GetFactionRank fbmwFightersGuild == 0
		IF FighterReputation >= 5
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Armorer >= 10 || Player.GetAV Block >= 10 || Player.GetAV HeavyArmor >= 10 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 10 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 10 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 10
			SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
		ENDIF

		IF QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwFGAdvancement 10
			SET FighterAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwFGAdvancement < 20 && Player.GetFactionRank fbmwFightersGuild == 1
		IF FighterReputation >= 10
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Strength >= 30 && Player.GetAV Endurance >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Armorer >= 20 || Player.GetAV Block >= 20 || Player.GetAV HeavyArmor >= 20 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 20 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 20 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 20
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwFGAdvancement 20
			SET FighterAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwFGAdvancement < 30 && Player.GetFactionRank fbmwFightersGuild == 2
		IF FighterReputation >= 20
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Strength >= 30 && Player.GetAV Endurance >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Armorer >= 30 || Player.GetAV Block >= 30 || Player.GetAV HeavyArmor >= 30 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 30 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 30 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 30
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwFGAdvancement 30
			SET FighterAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwFGAdvancement < 40 && Player.GetFactionRank fbmwFightersGuild == 3
		IF FighterReputation >= 30
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Strength >= 30 && Player.GetAV Endurance >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Armorer >= 40 || Player.GetAV Block >= 40 || Player.GetAV HeavyArmor >= 40 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 40 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 40 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 40
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwFGAdvancement 40
			SET FighterAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwFGAdvancement < 50 && Player.GetFactionRank fbmwFightersGuild == 4
		IF FighterReputation >= 45
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Strength >= 31 && Player.GetAV Endurance >= 31
			IF Player.GetAV Armorer >= 50 || Player.GetAV Block >= 50 || Player.GetAV HeavyArmor >= 50 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 50 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 50 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 50
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwFGAdvancement 50
			SET FighterAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwFGAdvancement < 60 && Player.GetFactionRank fbmwFightersGuild == 5
		IF FighterReputation >= 60
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Strength >= 32 && Player.GetAV Endurance >= 32
			IF Player.GetAV Armorer >= 60 || Player.GetAV Block >= 60 || Player.GetAV HeavyArmor >= 60 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 60 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 60 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 60
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwFGAdvancement 60
			SET FighterAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwFGAdvancement < 70 && Player.GetFactionRank fbmwFightersGuild == 6
		IF FighterReputation >= 90
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Strength >= 33 && Player.GetAV Endurance >= 33
			IF Player.GetAV Armorer >= 70 || Player.GetAV Block >= 70 || Player.GetAV HeavyArmor >= 70 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 70 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 70 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 70
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwFGAdvancement 70
			SET FighterAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwFGAdvancement < 80 && Player.GetFactionRank fbmwFightersGuild == 7
		IF FighterReputation >= 110
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Strength >= 34 && Player.GetAV Endurance >= 34
			IF Player.GetAV Armorer >= 80 || Player.GetAV Block >= 80 || Player.GetAV HeavyArmor >= 80 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 80 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 80 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 80
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwFGAdvancement 80
			SET FighterAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwFGAdvancement < 90 && Player.GetFactionRank fbmwFightersGuild == 8
		IF FighterReputation >= 125
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Strength >= 35 && Player.GetAV Endurance >= 35
			IF Player.GetAV Armorer >= 90 || Player.GetAV Block >= 90 || Player.GetAV HeavyArmor >= 90 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 90 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 90 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 90
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwFGAdvancement 90
			SET FighterAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ENDIF


; 1 = Skills Qualify; Reputation Does Not
; 2 = Reputation Qualifies, but Skills do Not

	IF QualifySkills == 0 && QualifyReputation == 0
		SET FighterAdvancement TO 0
	ELSEIF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 0
		SET FighterAdvancement TO 1
	ELSEIF  QualifySkills == 0 && QualifyReputation == 1
		SET FighterAdvancement TO 2
	ENDIF
END ; GameMode
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 1629 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>

SLSD - Local Variable Data.Unused: CD CD CD CD CD CD CD
